name: HistoricalChristmasFacts
0:
”Alexa, launch christmas facts”
”Alexa, start christmas facts”
”Alexa, open christmas facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas facts
des: Did you know each year, 30-35 million real Christmas trees are sold in the United States alone or that the first eggnog made in the United States was consumed in Captain John Smith’s 1607 Jamestown settlement. This skill will deliver interesting Christmas facts. Everything from it's history, to modern day traditions. Check back often as new facts are constantly being added.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
